adventuregame.player module¶

Module for the player class. Implements all actions, the player can do.

class player.Player¶

Bases: object

The player object contains all the actions a player can make.

hp¶

The players Health Points.

Type

int

inventory (

obj:’list’ of :obj:’Item’): The inventory of the player.

gold¶

The amount of gold the player has collected.

Type

int

location_x¶

Current position of the player on the x-axis.

Type

int

location_y¶

Current position of the player on the y-axis.

Type

int

victory¶

Boolean that is set true as soon as the player has won.

Type

bool

attack(enemy)¶

Deals damage to the enemy in this rooms.

Parameters

enemy – The enemy the player is fighting.

Returns

None

buy(trader)¶

Buys an item from the trader and puts it into the inventory.

Parameters

trader – The trader the player is interacting with.

Returns

None

do_action(action, **kwargs)¶

Maps the choosen Action object to the right player action.

Takes the name of the Method from the Action object. Then the matching player method gets executed. :param action: The Action object in which the matching player method is

saved.

Parameters

**kwargs – The argument that the specific player action requires, for example trader for the actions buy and sell.

Returns

None

flee(tile)¶

Moves the player randomly to an adjacent room.

Returns

None

Checks if the player is still alive.

Returns

False when player hp is 0 or negative.

Return type

bool
